JSONHandler - Class in service
Processes a request from a client for JSON validation.

JSONValidationService - Class in service
RESTful web-service for JSON validation.

Creates an instance of the class using defaults parameters.

JVSException - Exception in service
This exception class has been created to separate all existing exceptions from such that the JVS is using.
JVSOptions - Class in service
Holds parameters for JSON Validation Service.

Constructs a JVSOptions object with default configuration.

Constructs a JVSOptions object using parameters defined in a configuration file.
JVSOptionsBuilder - Class in service
Constructs JVSOptions using the variety of setter methods.
JVSOptionsBuilder() - Constructor for class service.JVSOptionsBuilder
Creates a JVSOptionsBuilder instance that can be used to build JVSOptions with various configuration settings.
JVSOptionsBuilder(JVSOptions) - Constructor for class service.JVSOptionsBuilder
Constructs a JVSOptionsBuilder instance from a JVSOptions instance.
JVSOptionsBuilder(String, int) - Constructor for class service.JVSOptionsBuilder
Configures JVSOptions to use specified hostname and port number.

M

Main - Class in <Unnamed>
The entry point of the project.

main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
 

N

newBuilder() - Method in class service.JVSOptions
Returns a new JVSOptionsBuilder containing all configuration used by the current instance.

S

service - package service
Provides the classes necessary to create JSON Validation Service.
setBacklog(int) - Method in class service.JVSOptionsBuilder
Sets a backlog which represents the maximum number of incoming TCP connections which the system will queue internally.
setDelay(int) - Method in class service.JVSOptionsBuilder
Stops the JVS service by closing the listening socket and disallowing any new exchanges from being processed.
setHost(String) - Method in class service.JVSOptionsBuilder
Sets a hostname or an IP address at which the server will accept requests.
setPath(String) - Method in class service.JVSOptionsBuilder
Sets a URI path which represents the location of the service on the given host.
setPort(int) - Method in class service.JVSOptionsBuilder
Sets a port number that is used by the service.
start() - Method in class service.JSONValidationService
Starts the service.
stop() - Method in class service.JSONValidationService
Stops the service.
